featured.text: For centuries, Zanzibar has been a heaven for beach lovers.

definition.zh_def: 天，通常指神聖的地方或宇宙的最高境界，常與幸福和安寧相關。
definition.en_def: A place or state of perfect happiness, often considered as the abode of God or the gods.
definition.example: Many people believe that their loved ones go to heaven after they pass away.
